extendedInfo.description: Simple Bluetooth toggle widget (1x1).Allows you On/Off your Bluetooth with only 1 click.RE ADD WIDGET ON HOME SCREEN AFTER INSTALL.v2.5.1- awd layout fixv2.5.0- fix for 1.5/1.6.- layout fix for FroyoLook for our AppManager and NEW ProcessManager.DOESN'T WORK ON CLIQ

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: This great & allot better than the phone widget installed way to big! This is right size & works perfectly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bluetooth. On and off switch. App.
reviews.comment: This is a excellent. App turn turn on your Bluetooth. Instead. Of going Into your phone settings this app just click on the app and your good to talk hands free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Got \"FC\" on Archos A101IT (Froyo) every time. Crazy enough that I\'m using the 3 other Widgets such as Wi-Fi, GPS, & brightness with no problem at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is it me?
reviews.comment: I downloaded the app and moved it (successfully) to the home screen. When touched, it says toggling the bluetooth but it doesn\'t do anything; obviouslt not quite idiot proof yet!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on HTC rezound
reviews.comment: Not showing up in widget list on my rezound running ICS. :( Works fine on my nexus 10, though, so I\'m conflicted.
reviews.author: Suzy Rasmussen

reviews.comment: Love his widget. Makes switching bluetooth on/off so much easier!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recommended every app for tablet!!
reviews.comment: If you have a tablet I highly recommended every one of curvefishs apps.  :-)  :-)  :-)  :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just Right
reviews.comment: Want an app that turns on BT and then connects your paired headset? This. It. Love it. Keeps me from going to BT settings so much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: After reading other reviews, i am now able to use this app to its full capacity.  Not only does it turn bluetooth on/off, but if you touch the bottom of the icon, the settings come up to allow you to pair your headset.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worked ok kind slow didn\'t always turn Bluetooth on even if widget said it was on there are better apps get one of those.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice but it hasn\'t afull control to switch on the bluetooth cos I have to make my phone discoverable after beeing switched on.so modification is amust
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Works splendidly on my overclocked (1.2ghz) XT720 running Dexter\'s Froyo...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thanks for this service, but clicking on it and it didn\'t work, does it need a network connection? I wish someone help me . By { Best 4 eva }
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the graphic but...
reviews.comment: It only turns bluetooth on and off. It doesn\'t connect to your remembered or paired devices. You still have to go to settings to connect. What this app does you can do through your task bar making it a bloat app for ignorant ppl  that aren\'t aware how to use their droid. If it auto connected it would be a must have! Dumb waste of screen and memory space as it.is now, unfortunately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is not an option for me now. It makes it so easy to turn my bluetooth on/off, without a lot of hassle
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I luv Curve Fish. Their apps always work!!!! Thank you!! HTC Incredible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The instant I downloaded it my phone started glitching up. Like the iphone after 4.0 update. Uninstalled and left a dumb icon I can\'t remove
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just wasted my space
reviews.comment: I hate to say it but it did not work on my Prism. Turn OFF is easy but turning ON is not. You still have to pair your device so T-Mobile\' screen has a better option, at least for now. Do not take me wrong, my device was paired but sometimes it does not seem to remember the settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
reviews.comment: A widget that is icon sized and does exactly what I want.  It\'s a toggle switch for the bluetooth radio.  Nothing more, nothing less, perfect.  With respect to a recent comment, I have no idea why the guy\'s BT would not reconnect to his device.  My hands free reconnected seconds after turning the BT radio back on.  Finding this widget made my day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless but nice looking!
reviews.comment: Nice looking widget but it\'s useless because doesn\'t turn on discoverable mode!
reviews.author: A Google User
